entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who had taken the Marauder's Map.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is a magical object that Ron had taken.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is mentioned as the one who came sprinting down into the dungeons.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards and witches that Professor Flitwick was shouting about.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as being present with the narrator in the dungeons.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as being in his office when Professor Flitwick came bursting in.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who urged Hermione to continue talking.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being present with the narrator in the dungeons and having a conversation with Harry.

relationships.description: Professor Flitwick was shouting about Death Eaters in the castle.
Professor Flitwick burst into Snape's office and told him to go back with him and help.
Hermione said that they should take care of Professor Flitwick while Snape went to help fight the Death Eaters.
